title: Fireside with the Underboss - "Allie Boys Head Hits The Seat, Blood is Everywhere"
description: Allie Boy and Sammy are trunkin' around the neighborhood when all of a sudden bullets start flying. Sammy has to think incredibly fast and figure a way out to try and save both their lives.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Allie Boy and Sammy are trunkin' around the neighborhood when all of a sudden bullets start flying. Sammy has to think incredibly fast and figure a way out to try and save both their lives.
